hero.subtitle: Hi, I'm Alex
hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.introduction: I create functional web applications focused in performance, aesthetics, and efficiency, keeping the code clean and easy to maintain.

tasks: I collaborated on the development of an application for managing team vacations, streamlining the process and reducing manual tasks by over 50%.
I developed a REST API using Spring Boot to handle data exchange between the vacation management application and the database.
I optimized emails, landing pages, and campaigns in Hubspot, resulting in an increase in lead conversion.
I developed an internal application for managing courses, users, and the issuance of training certificates, reducing administrative time and minimizing manual processes.
I implemented automated tests for the API endpoints, reducing the likelihood of errors by 60% and improving code stability.

projects.apiarchiveDescription: Simple resource for discovering different kinds of APIs with search, category browsing, and filters.
projects.toolsydeDescription: Toolbox style application based on microservices with a variety of utilities for developers.
projects.mobeliaDescription: Modern furniture e-commerce with responsive design, shopping cart, secure payments, and social authentication.
projects.sourceButtonAria: Go to the project's code in GitHub
